fullplot: A dark thriller about a successful businesswoman and her young assistant who toy with a slow-witted businessman while stuck at an airport hotel.
plot: Two businesswomen bond and reveal their inner natures while getting carried away on a revenge attack against an accused rapist.
title: The Business of Strangers

tomatoes.consensus: The Business of Strangers showcases a complex, compelling performance by Channing. Her interactions and clashes with Stiles make for riveting viewing.
